param.name: popupwidth
param.label: Popup width
param.description: The width of the popup window

param.name: popupheight
param.label: Popup height
param.description: The height of the popup window

param.name: autopopup
param.label: Auto Popup
param.description: Automatically show popup window when new items are dumped.

param.name: maxdepth
param.label: Maximum recursion depth
param.description: The number of levels that should be dumped for arrays and objects. Min=1, max=20

param.name: maxstrlength
param.label: Maximum String Length
param.description: Long strings will be trimmed to this number of characters.

param.name: showOrigin
param.label: Show origin of call
param.description: Show the file, line and method from where dump was called.
